Uses of Class
org.apache.flink.api.java.operators.JoinOperator

  • Packages that use JoinOperator 
    Package Description
    org.apache.flink.api.java.operators  

    • Uses of JoinOperator in org.apache.flink.api.java.operators

      Subclasses of JoinOperator in org.apache.flink.api.java.operators 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  JoinOperator.DefaultJoin<I1,I2>
      A Join transformation that wraps pairs of joining elements into Tuple2.
      It also represents the DataSet that is the result of a Join transformation.
      static class  JoinOperator.EquiJoin<I1,I2,OUT>
      A Join transformation that applies a on each pair of joining elements.
      It also represents the DataSet that is the result of a Join transformation.
      static class  JoinOperator.ProjectJoin<I1,I2,OUT extends Tuple>
      A Join transformation that projects joining elements or fields of joining Tuples into result Tuples.
      Methods in org.apache.flink.api.java.operators that return JoinOperator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JoinOperator<I1,I2,OUT> JoinOperator.ProjectJoin.withConstantSetFirst(String... constantSetFirst) 
      JoinOperator<I1,I2,OUT> JoinOperator.ProjectJoin.withConstantSetSecond(String... constantSetSecond)
